global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white shirt, beige pants, and black shoes, holding a map in his right hand and wearing sunglasses, with his face heading to his left, and a watch on his left hand; a woman wearing a white shirt with pink and light blue small flower patterns, short jeans, and a pair of black sandals, holding a coffee in her left hand and a grey luggage in her right hand, not wearing sunglasses; a man wearing a green neon t-shirt, beige shorts, and black shoes, with short black hair, a watch on his left wrist, and his face heading to his left; a woman wearing a long light-blue dress with no sleeves and a pair of sandals, holding a beige hat in her left hand and a black camera in her right hand, with the camera held right in front of her face as she is seeing through the lens; and a city with yellow and white colored antique buildings in the back.
